message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
You're starting high, I'm going low!
You're being too greedy! I'll make a new offer that's more in line with the decreasing value of the money.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give in too quickly. Your turn!
You're not budging, I'll try to squeeze more out of you!
You're getting aggressive, but I'm not going to give in to your squeeze. I'll make a new offer that's even more aggressive.
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not going to give up yet. This is my best offer so far, take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, take a small share or walk away with nothing!
You're trying to bully me, but I'm not going to take a tiny share. I'll make one last attempt to negotiate.
This is my last offer, take it or we both walk away with nothing. I'm giving you a significant share, but I need to get something out of this deal.
